# UpcomingPassInformationEntry.BackFields

**Object**

The fields of information displayed in the details view  of the upcoming pass information entry.

## Declaration

```swift
object UpcomingPassInformationEntry.BackFields
```

## Adding information to multievent passes

- **UpcomingPassInformationEntry.AdditionalInfoFields**: The fields of information that display in the Additional Info section below a pass.
- **UpcomingPassInformationEntry.DateInformation**: Information about the start and end time of the upcoming pass information entry.
- **UpcomingPassInformationEntry.Images**: A collection of image names used to populate images in the details view.
- **UpcomingPassInformationEntry.URLs**: An object with links to information about the upcoming pass information entry.

## Inherits From

- PassFieldContent
